title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 9978.3 - Statements access officer
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 9978.3 - Statements access officer

State Regulations

The executive director of the commission is hereby designated
as the statements access officer. The statements access officer shall: (a) coordinate the commission's response to
requests for public inspection of annual statements; (b) provide information concerning the
location of the annual statements, maintain a current list of annual statements
for public inspection and respond to all inquiries relating to the availability
to the public of the annual statements; (c) receive and process requests for public
inspection of annual statements in the manner provided in these regulations; and
(d) designate one or more
members of the staff of the commission, as necessary, to serve as assistant
statements access officer, and such assistants shall have the same functions
and responsibilities as the statements access officer, except for the power to
designate other assistants. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
9978.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
